problem.markdown:
>>All physical processes are quasi-static processes<< ( ) True (x) False
[explanation] No physical process is perfectly quasi-static. In fact only very few can be approximated as such. [explanation]
problem.p: All physical processes are quasi-static processes

choicegroup.label: All physical processes are quasi-static processes

div.p: No physical process is perfectly quasi-static. In fact only very few can be approximated as such.
